Class VimeoBase

Description
Description | Methods (details) Constants (details)

Vimeo base class

Provides vital functions to API (access, permission and object handling)

Located in /lib/class.vimeo.php (line 27)

		static method buildAuthenticationUrl (line 397)
	
 
	
	

Build authentication URL


Easy way to build a correct authentication url. You can use this  to link the user directly to the correct vimeo authentication page.

	
    
				
  • return: URL you can use to directly link the user to the vimeo authentication page
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

	    static
		string
		
			buildAuthenticationUrl
		
					(string $ePermission)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$ePermission: Permission level you need the user to give you (i.e. VimeoBase::PERMISSION_READ)			
    • 
				

		
			
	




	
	

		static method clearToken (line 437)
	
 
	
	

Clear current logged in user token


Removes the current logged in user from the cache. Next API query  will be made as clean, not logged in, request.

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

	    static
		void
		
			clearToken
		
				()

		checkPermission (line 127)
	
 
	
	

Check permission


Checks the current user permission with the given one. This will be  heavily used by the executeRemoteCall method to ensure the user  will not run into trouble.

	
    
				
  • return: TRUE if access can be granted, FALSE if permission denied
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		boolean
		
			checkPermission
		
					(string $ePermissionNeeded)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$ePermissionNeeded: Needed Permission			
    • 
				

		
			
	




	
	

		executeRemoteCall (line 162)
	
 
	
	

Proxy for API queries


Will check permission for the requested API method as well as type  of the object result response or exception. Will call the given  API query handler method (default: executeRemoteCall_CURL) for  the raw connection stuff

	
    
				
  • return: Response object of API corresponding query (for vimeo.test.login you will get VimeoTestLoginResponse object)
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		VimeoResponse
		
			executeRemoteCall
		
					(string $sMethod, [array $aArgs = array()])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$sMethod: API method name			
    • 
					
  • 
				array
				$aArgs: Additional arguments that need to be passed to the API			
    • 
				

		
			
	




	
	

		executeVideopostCall (line 286)
	
 
	
	

Proxy for video uploads


Will call the given video upload handler method (default: executeVideopostCall_FSOCK)  for the raw connection and send stuff

	
    
				
  • return: VimeoVideosCheckUploadStatusResponse
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		string
		
			executeVideopostCall
		
					(string $sFilename, [string $sTicket = false])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$sFilename: Local filename to be transfered			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$sTicket: Ticket			
    • 
				

		
			
	




	
	

		login (line 494)
	
 
	
	

Ensures that the user is logged in


ONLY USED IN SITE-MODE, see howto.autologin.php  Ensures the site-account is logged in

	
    
				
  • return: TRUE if user could be logged in, FALSE if an error occured (try manually to see error)
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		boolean
		
			login
		
					(string $sUsername, string $sPassword)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$sUsername: Username			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$sPassword: Password			
    • 
				

		
			
	




	
	

		permit (line 451)
	
 
	
	

Execute a permit request


ONLY USED IN SITE-MODE, see howto.autologin.php  Permits the current CURL cached user with your vimeo API application

	
    
				
  • return: Vimeo Token
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		string
		
			permit
		
					(string $ePermission)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$ePermission: Permission			
    •

			REQUEST_ENGINE_CURL
			 =  'executeRemoteCall_CURL'
			(line 71)
		
	


	

You can choose between the following engines:


executeRemoteCall_FSOCK = PHP5 file_get_content and stream_contexts (bad error handling)  executeRemoteCall_CURL = CURL is used for file transfer (better error handling)
